name: Native Figma Texture
description:
Create textures in Figma without plugins or raster graphics by combining Linear fills, Inner shadow and transparent color.


What's Included

  • 64 pre-made textures
  • color exploration for you to customize
  • New FigBlog with insights on how I found this trick
  • YouTube tutorial https://youtu.be/bfXRaVu3rcs
